title: Statement from Principal Woolf on the passing of Principal Emeritus Watts (Queen's University)
text: ( Source : Queen's University ) It is with deep sadness and regret that I announce to the Queen's community the passing of Principal Emeritus Ronald Lampman Watts . Dr. Watts served as the university's 15th principal from 1974-'84, and remained
